posts.name: Max Radermacher
posts.cooked:
Today, we’re releasing version 7.82 to beta. If you’re interested in participating, join the beta group.

Release notes:

  • Just in time for autumn, the new “Leafless Tree” emoji (along with the other six new emoji in Unicode 16.0) are now supported in emoji reactions.

In addition, with this release we’re continuing our TestFlight-exclusive testing of Backups. See the beta release post for 7.79 for more details.

Please continue to report any issues you encounter! We’ve added a new beta-only notification if your device runs into certain validation errors, so let us know if you see that.

When reporting issues, please include debug logs and screenshots if applicable; if you’re experiencing a crash, please also include .ips files. Instructions can be found here.

Thank you all, as always, for helping us improve Signal!

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.79 release
Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.81 release

posts.cooked:
New Version: 7.82.0.1102-beta

56 new commits since 7.81.0.1095-beta (+ 1 commit omitted):

Show commits

  • Bump version to 7.82 [1]

  • Remote config list media refresh interval; make it lower for internal/beta [2]

  • Hide navigation bar in reg splash screen. […] [3]

  • Update disappearing messages bar button item [4]

  • Introduce OWSViewController.contentLayoutGuide. […] [5] (reverted by [6])

  • Revert "Introduce OWSViewController.contentLayoutGuide." [6] (reverts [5])

  • Bump to libsignal v0.84.0 [7]

  • Add details for loading lifecycle events [8] (reverted by [19])

  • Update various pin entry screen to modern appearance. [9]

  • Show an FYISheet when Backups entitlement expires [10]

  • Update entitlements to reflect support for satellite networks. [11]

  • Add more details for loading lifecycle events [12] (reverted by [18])

  • Avoid Backups error display on iPad [13]

  • Implement poll vote sending [14]

  • Expiring end poll TSInfoMessages [15]

  • Polls UI Polish [16]

  • Clamp estimated attachment size to fit in UInt32 [17]

  • Revert "Add more details for loading lifecycle events" [18] (reverts [12])

  • Revert "Add details for loading lifecycle events" [19] (reverts [8])

  • Fix brief appearance of loading progress [20]

  • Sync votes across linked devices [21]

  • Only delete backup orphans if we have an observer [22]

  • Durably fetch SVRB during (re)registration with existing AEP [23]

  • Drop invalid interaction rows from Backups [24]

  • Move list media integrity check into a checker protocol that can be stubbed in prod and do expensive stuff in beta/internal [25]

  • Notify in <=beta for list media integrity check failure [26]

  • Silently register backupId on restore failure [27]

  • Update a couple registration checks [28]

  • [RFC] Use objc instantiation of AVAssetReaderTrackOutput to avoid crashes [29]

  • Persist attempted AVAssetReaderTrackOutput.inits; skip if previously crashed [30]

  • Fix no background for various PIN input screens in dark mode. [31]

  • Revert poll ended state if message fails to send. [32]

  • Notifications for poll vote creators [33]

  • Don't reset restore method for a bad key during manual restore [34]

  • Simplify msToSec [35]

  • Handle overflow in PaddingBucket [36]

  • Add ActionSheet when disabling Backups, but still subscribed [37]

  • Show FYISheet if downgrading BackupPlan when offboarding from TestFlight [38]

  • Introduce OWSViewController.contentLayoutGuide. […] [39]

  • Add convenience methods for setting up standard full-screen static views. […] [40]

  • Fix deserialization of old integrity checks [41]

  • Tweak a couple Internal settings views [42]

  • Always flush logger in owsFailDebug [43]

  • Update to Unicode 16.0 Emoji [44]

  • Fix another deserialization problem [45]

  • Update reg flow screens to use new convenience static view creation methods. […] [46]

  • Update iPad's linking flow designs. […] [47]

  • Update reg profile screen to match new designs. [48]

  • Don't backup export plaintext hash for totally-invalid attachments [49]

  • Update release notes [50]

  • Update translations [51]

  • Fix empty group member sheet in prod builds. [52]

  • Revert "Relax Xcode version checks in GitHub Actions" [53]

  • Revert "Use Xcode 26.0.1" [54]

  • Revert "Fix Xcode 26 builds on CI" [55]

  • Revert "Switch to Xcode 26.0" [56]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-iOS 7.81.0.1095-beta…7.82.0.1102-beta

link_counts.title: Support for Iridium Go Satellite data device

posts.cooked:
I enabled (paid-tier) backups and got the new verification error notification right as the app autostarted the first backup! The backup seems to have gone on to complete successfully. I queued up another immediately afterwards and didn’t get the notification that time.

I switched to my password manager at some point during the backup but iirc it was after I got the notification.

Debug logs:

https://debuglogs.org/ios/7.82.0/a050eb85003f1a9ad3eb3aaee2fff06c7c53334c67b2aadbe8b2d6dd4aeb3ac4.zip

posts.name: Sasha Weiss
posts.cooked:
Thanks for reporting. This is benign – we shouldn’t be showing an error here!

For context, we’ve recently added notifications if we detect that something went wrong with your backed-up media. It was incorrectly firing on first-enabling Backups.

New Version: 7.82.0.1105-beta

4 new commits since 7.82.0.1102-beta:

  • Update release notes [1]

  • Update translations [2]

  • Move conditional body inside conditional branch [3]

  • Handle missing CDN info better in the SVR​ restore path [4]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-iOS 7.82.0.1102-beta…7.82.0.1105-beta
